name: Gun Bunny
description:
Controls

Left Arrow & Right Arrow: Move Bunny

E: Shoot

Spacebar: Jump

Description

I developed this proof of concept with the aid of Unity's 2D game kit as practice for reskinning and retooling the standard elements of the game kit for use in an original platformer.  I hope you enjoy this game, as short as it is, and know that it is my intent to come up with some in-house graphics and draft up a proper platfomer with bunnies and guns.

Assets Used

Unity's 2D Game Kit

Kenney Pixel Line Platformer Pack

Unity Asset Store Casual Game BGM 05
